wordpressPost.title: Mega Churches (Thought)
wordpressPost.content:
Tonight at church we saw a clip of Saddleback Church* in Orange County (USA), they have several thousand in at each service and it’s huge!

However the more I hear about mega-churches of thousands of people the less biblical I think they are, I think perhaps church is meant to be smaller in numbers….I shall attempt to find time to explore this properly and blog in the next few days!

*Saddeback church is home of Rick Warren, fat american who wrote a book called ‘Purpose Driven Life’ amongst others (don’t read it, it’s dull!)
